de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.overlay.dht.centralized
Class ServerNode

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.overlay.AbstractOverlayNode
      de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.overlay.dht.centralized.ServerNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, ComponentEventListener, ConnectivityListener, OperationCallback, SupportOperations, OverlayNode, TransMessageListener
public class ServerNode
extends AbstractOverlayNode
implements TransMessageListener

Server node of a napster-like pseudo-p2p overlay network. All mappings will be stored here. The server should not have an application running on top of it.

Version:
3.0, 29.11.2007
Author:
Konstantin Pussep, Sebastian Kaune

public void messageArrived(TransMsgEvent receivingEvent)
Description copied from interface: TransMessageListener
Upon receiving a transport message, the transport layer strips off the header information of this message and passes all relevant data to a given TransMessageListener in terms of TransMsgEvent.

Specified by:

createOperation

public Operation createOperation(java.lang.String opName,
                                 java.lang.String[] params,
                                 OperationCallback callback)
Description copied from interface: SupportOperations
Create an appropriate Operation. The component checks whether it can create an operation with the given name and number of parameters. This method is used only to specify operations via configuration (action) files.

Specified by:
createOperation in interface SupportOperations
Parameters:
opName - - operation name
params - - operation parameters if required.
callback - - caller Object which will be informed when the operation finishes (successfully or with a failure)
Returns:
operation - created (can be scheduled or executed immediately)
